ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Renders DOT diagram markup language in R and also provides the possibility to export the graphs in PostScript and SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) formats. In addition, it supports literate programming packages such as 'knitr' and 'rmarkdown'.

Renders DOT diagram markup language in R and also provides the possibility to export the graphs in PostScript and SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) formats. In addition, it supports literate programming packages such as 'knitr' and 'rmarkdown'.

name: r-dot
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dot
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/DOT_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/DOT/DOT_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 110ca947176aa964509fe35ae5f81d2409f4dfe304a7627db182a5cb4eb10562

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-v8 >=1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-v8 >=1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('DOT')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('DOT')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://haghish.com/dot
  license: MIT
  summary: Renders DOT diagram markup language in R and also provides the possibility to export
    the graphs in PostScript and SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) formats. In addition,
    it supports literate programming packages such as 'knitr' and 'rmarkdown'.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: DOT
# Type: Package
# Title: Render and Export DOT Graphs in R
# Version: 0.1
# Date: 2016-04-02
# Author: E. F. Haghish
# Maintainer: E. F. Haghish <haghish@imbi.uni-freiburg.de>
# Description: Renders DOT diagram markup language in R and also provides the possibility to export the graphs in PostScript and SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) formats. In addition, it supports literate programming packages such as 'knitr' and 'rmarkdown'.
# Imports: V8 (>= 1.0), tools
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
# NeedsCompilation: no
# URL: http://haghish.com/dot
# BugReports: http://github.com/haghish/DOT
# Repository: CRAN
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# Packaged: 2016-04-15 12:25:22 UTC; haghish
# Date/Publication: 2016-04-16 04:29:08
